q: `` We're happy the majority of workers at Mirafiori has understood Fiat's commitment to transform it into a plant with an international reach,'' Sergio Marchionne , 58, said in an e-mailed statement today. We're happy because workers with their vote showed they have confidence in their future. Our plan for this plant is very ambitious. Donald Rumsfeld takes particular offense at Powell's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq.`` Powell was not duped or misled by anybody,'' Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam's suspected WMD stockpiles. The George W. Bush did not lie. The vice George W. Bush did not lie.[ CIA Director George W. Bush ] Tenet did not lie.
